entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:21 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 4:35 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
